summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center's Legal Department, transmitting discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell for her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at MDC to whom discovery materials are being sent for her criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
MDCâ€”Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is dated August 13, 2020, during the pre-trial phase of Ghislaine Maxwell's federal criminal case (20 Cr. 330).
Ghislaine Maxwell was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn, NY, under inmate number 02879-509.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was transmitting discovery materials to Maxwell in custody, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
